Notes: Materials by, about, & against Baptists from a wide variety of denominations within the U.S. and around the globe.  Includes the archives of the American Baptist Churches, USA (formerly the Northern Baptist Convention), American Baptist Foreign Mission Society, American Baptist Publication Societies, & American Baptist Home Mission Societies & the Baptist World Alliance. Original manuscripts,state & association annual minutes, original church records,books & pamphlets, serials, photographs, artifacts. Personal papers includes those of the Walter Rauschenbusch family and many other ministers and missionaries.
